SALIR_PREGUNTA: Do you want to exit the application?
MOVER_PREGUNTA: Want to move {{nombre}} to Shopping List?
INCLUIR_PREGUNTA: Want to add {{nombre}} to Shopping List?
BORRAR_PREGUNTA_LISTAS: Want to delete {{name}} of all your lists?
PREGUNTA_INCLUIR_LISTA_COMPRA: Ask to add to Shopping List
TEXTO_DEVELOPER_1: This is an application designed for those who want to have order on your fridge, cupboards, pantry ...
TEXTO_DEVELOPER_2: In addition to manage the shopping list, even sharing it with friends or family.
NO_EXISTEN_LISTAS: There is not shopping lists saved
TUT_01: Welcome to Cupboard! Here you can manage your shopping list and the cupboards of your home
TUT_02: Swiping with your finger from left you can see the menu options
TUT_03: You can make a backup, recover a backup and see when you did the last backup of your data. Also you can send an email to the development team if you find an error or if you have suggestions
TUT_07: You can sort your lists and add new one by your needs
TUT_08: Configuring the color of your lists
TUT_09: On every list you can filter by element, add a reminder and the elements you want save on it
TUT_11: You can configure the text, the date and the hour on your reminders that will show up you a notification
TUT_12: Swiping with your finger from right on an element you can see the options ... delete, edit, move to other list and close the options. Also, the amount of every element can be changed with the - and + buttons
TUT_13: On every element you can assign a miminum amount to assign to the sopping list and a expire date. The element name will be searched from your own element list to make it easier to add items to your lists
TUT_15: The shopping list is special, you canÂ´t move it from its original position and you can do some actions more ... clean the marked elements, clean the complete list, save the shopping list and retrieve a saved list
TUT_16: The elements of the shopping list can have them pending ...
TUT_17: ... or marked as acquired, to make your walk around the store easy to follow your shopping list
TUT_18: Before yo go to shopping you can check your element list, to check what do you have ...
TUT_19: ... or what do you need. Even click on the bag ...
TUT_20: ... generating a list of elements that do you need for you to decide if you want to add them to the shopping list
TUT_21: Last you can configure the behaviour of the app: indicating the default minimum amount of the elements to add to the shopping list, if you want to delete from a list when the amount of an element reaches 0, if you want the app prompts you before adding an element to the shopping list, if you want to receive notifications about the elements near to expire, furthermore the language of the app. Enjoy managing your Cupboard!
